sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MovieSerie } from 'src/app/shared/interfaces/MovieSerie.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inicio', templateUrl: './inicio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inicio.component.css'] }) export class InicioComponent { movies_series : MovieSerie[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Die Hart the Movie', description: 'Follows a fictionalized version of Kevin Hart, as he tries to become an action movie star. He attends a school run by Ron Wilcox, where he attempts to learn the ropes on how to become one of the industrys most coveted action stars.', image: 'https://www.themoviedb.org/t/p/w600_and_h900_bestv2/u1u5tEew9zdfqJJuBXyauLQoAmT.jpg', rating: 0, category: 'Movie' }, { id: 2, name: 'Prueba 2', description: 'Prueba description 2', image: 'https://www.themoviedb.org/t/p/w600_and_h900_bestv2/u1u5tEew9zdfqJJuBXyauLQoAmT.jpg', rating: 0, category: 'Serie' }, { id: 3, name: 'Prueba 3', description: 'Prueba description 3', image: '', rating: 0, category: 'Movie' } ] }
